name: Ext_R5_Device_type
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.Device.type for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents Device.type from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Device|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: The kind or type of device
element.definition: The kind or type of device. A device instance may have more than one type - in which case those are the types that apply to the specific instance of the device.
element.comment: `Device.type` maps to R4B `Device.type`. Changed from an array to a single value (max cardinality from * to 1). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
